img_summary: This image depicts **The Spirit of Captain Wise-Voice**, an epic item from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. It is described as "a unique cluster of will that cannot be cultivated" and is obtained by defeating Captain Wise-Voice at the Pagoda Realm - Mani Wheel Shrine in The New West (a mandatory boss). The item can be combined with other Captain Spirits—Lotus-Vision, Void-Illusion, and Kalpa-Wave—to interact with the prisoner in the first cell at the base of the Pagoda Realm.
